abstract: The addressing preferences of the current user.
overview:
## Discussion

If the user hasn’t specified preferences, or chose not to share them with this app, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Morphology/isUnspecified] property is `true`.

This value doesn’t change throughout the lifetime of the process.

# user

**Type Property**

The addressing preferences of the current user.

## Declaration

```swift
static let user: Morphology
```

## Discussion

If the user hasn’t specified preferences, or chose not to share them with this app, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Morphology/isUnspecified] property is `true`.

This value doesn’t change throughout the lifetime of the process.
title: user
